title: The World on a Plate - Mina Holland
description:
Eat your way around the world without leaving your home in this mouthwatering cultural history of 100 classic dishes.

Why do we associate Argentina with steak? Why do people in Marseille eat bouillabaisse? What spices make a dish taste North African versus North Indian? What is the story behind the curries of India? And how do you know whether to drink a wine from Bourdeaux or one from Burgundy?
